description: Describes the specified WorkSpaces. You can filter the results by using the bundle identifier, directory identifier, or owner, but you can specify only one filter at a time.

parameters.name: WorkspaceIds
parameters.description: The identifiers of the WorkSpaces. You cannot combine this parameter with any other filter. Because the  CreateWorkspaces operation is asynchronous, the identifier it returns is not immediately available. If you immediately call  DescribeWorkspaces with this identifier, no information is returned. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Workspaces
nested_items.description: Information about the WorkSpaces.

nested_items.name: WorkspaceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: DirectoryId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Directory Service directory for the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: UserName
nested_items.description: The user for the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: IpAddress
nested_items.description: The IP address of the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The operational state of the WorkSpace.

nested_items.type: for example, the WorkSpace is being created
nested_items.description: PENDING --- The WorkSpace is in a waiting state (for example, the WorkSpace is being created).
AVAILABLE --- The WorkSpace is running and has passed the health checks.
IMPAIRED --- Refer to UNHEALTHY state.
UNHEALTHY --- The WorkSpace is not responding to health checks.
REBOOTING --- The WorkSpace is being rebooted (restarted).
STARTING --- The WorkSpace is starting up and health checks are being run.
REBUILDING --- The WorkSpace is being rebuilt.
RESTORING --- The WorkSpace is being restored.
MAINTENANCE --- The WorkSpace is undergoing scheduled maintenance by Amazon Web Services.
ADMIN_MAINTENANCE --- The WorkSpace is undergoing maintenance by the WorkSpaces administrator.
TERMINATING --- The WorkSpace is being deleted.
TERMINATED --- The WorkSpace has been deleted.
SUSPENDED --- The WorkSpace has been suspended for image creation.
UPDATING --- The WorkSpace is undergoing an update.
STOPPING --- The WorkSpace is being stopped.
STOPPED --- The WorkSpace has been stopped.

nested_items.type: for example, an error occurred during startup
nested_items.description: ERROR --- The WorkSpace is an error state (for example, an error occurred during startup).

nested_items.name: BundleId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the bundle used to create the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: SubnetId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the subnet for the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: The text of the error message that is returned if the WorkSpace cannot be created.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The error code that is returned if the WorkSpace cannot be created.

nested_items.name: ComputerName
nested_items.description: The name of the WorkSpace, as seen by the operating system. The format of this name varies. For more information, see Launch a WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: VolumeEncryptionKey
nested_items.description: The ARN of the symmetric KMS key used to encrypt data stored on your WorkSpace. Amazon WorkSpaces does not support asymmetric KMS keys.

nested_items.name: UserVolumeEncryptionEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the data stored on the user volume is encrypted.

nested_items.name: RootVolumeEncryptionEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the data stored on the root volume is encrypted.

nested_items.name: WorkspaceName
nested_items.description: The name of the user-decoupled WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: WorkspaceProperties
nested_items.description: The properties of the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: RunningMode
nested_items.description: The running mode. For more information, see Manage the WorkSpace Running Mode.

nested_items.name: RunningModeAutoStopTimeoutInMinutes
nested_items.description: The time after a user logs off when WorkSpaces are automatically stopped. Configured in 60-minute intervals.

nested_items.name: RootVolumeSizeGib
nested_items.description: The size of the root volume. For important information about how to modify the size of the root and user volumes, see Modify a WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: UserVolumeSizeGib
nested_items.description: The size of the user storage. For important information about how to modify the size of the root and user volumes, see Modify a WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: ComputeTypeName
nested_items.description: The compute type. For more information, see Amazon WorkSpaces Bundles.

nested_items.name: Protocols
nested_items.description: The protocol. For more information, see Protocols for Amazon WorkSpaces.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: OperatingSystemName
nested_items.description: The name of the operating system.

nested_items.name: GlobalAccelerator
nested_items.description: Indicates the Global Accelerator properties.

nested_items.name: Mode
nested_items.description: Indicates if Global Accelerator for WorkSpaces is enabled, disabled, or the same mode as the associated directory.

nested_items.name: PreferredProtocol
nested_items.description: Indicates the preferred protocol for Global Accelerator.

nested_items.name: ModificationStates
nested_items.description: The modification states of the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: Resource
nested_items.description: The resource.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The modification state.

nested_items.name: RelatedWorkspaces
nested_items.description: The standby WorkSpace or primary WorkSpace related to the specified WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: WorkspaceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the related WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Region of the related WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: Indicates the state of the WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: Indicates the type of WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: DataReplicationSettings
nested_items.description: Indicates the settings of the data replication.

nested_items.name: DataReplication
nested_items.description: Indicates whether data replication is enabled, and if enabled, the type of data replication.

nested_items.name: RecoverySnapshotTime
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the last successful snapshot was taken of the primary WorkSpace used for replicating data.

nested_items.name: StandbyWorkspacesProperties
nested_items.description: The properties of the standby WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: StandbyWorkspaceId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the standby WorkSpace.

nested_items.name: DataReplication
nested_items.description: Indicates whether data replication is enabled, and if enabled, the type of data replication.

nested_items.name: RecoverySnapshotTime
nested_items.description: The date and time at which the last successful snapshot was taken of the primary WorkSpace used for replicating data.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
